content: the youtube tutorial contains the instructions for the bikini classic body type the pdf pattern includes the written instructions for the bikini **classic curvy tall & petite body types** hat and tote bag > you may sell the items you create from this pattern as long as i am credited as the original designer > > the contends of this pdf may not be shared published reproduced altered translated or resold either in parts or in whole follow me on instagram for updates on new patterns https //www instagram com/madewithlovebydaisy/ subscribe to my youtube channel for free tutorials https //www youtube com/@madewithlovebydaisy happy hooking daisy
